triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: Foundational method that the paper extends to handle multiple conflicting objectives.

triples.name: Multi-objective optimization
triples.relevance: Core optimization approach applied to decision-making problems with conflicting objectives that the paper addresses.

triples.name: Sequential decision making
triples.relevance: The primary problem domain of complex real-world tasks requiring trade-offs between multiple objectives.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Decision-theoretic planning method for synthesizing action sequences in multi-objective decision problems.
